price: Na hatukuuangamiza mji wowote ule ila ulikuwa na muda wake maalumu.
arabic: وَمَآ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَرۡيَةٍ إِلَّا وَلَهَا كِتَابٞ مَّعۡلُومٞ
footnotes: Na ikiwa wao wanataka wateremshiwe adhabu ya duniani, kama Mwenyezi Mungu alivyo wateketeza walio kuwa kabla yao, basi wajue kuwa Mwenyezi Mungu hauteketezi mji wowote ila kwa wakati wake maalumu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wamā ahlaknā min qaryatin illā walahā kitābun maʿlūmun
